title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: School Disaster Preparedness Training Simulation: Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can clearly distinguish roles of school members and disaster managers and design collaboration plans within 11 minutes in emergency scenarios
Participants can propose optimal solutions reflecting real constraints (time, resources, personnel) when developing disaster response plans through a Problem-Based Learning (PBL) model
Participants can apply response procedures for various disaster types (typhoons, earthquakes, tornadoes, etc.) with over 80% accuracy via VR simulations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
